sourcesContent:
export const testimonials = [
  {
    name: "Margaret Thompson",
    role: "Senior Client - Age 82",
    text: "The mobile service is a blessing! Dr. Smith comes to my home every month for my diabetic foot care. I no longer worry about transportation or long waits in the clinic. The personalized attention and professional care I receive at home has significantly improved my foot health and overall quality of life.",
    rating: 5,
    image: "üëµ",
    condition: "Diabetic Foot Care"
  },
  {
    name: "James Rodriguez",
    role: "Marathon Runner - Age 34",
    text: "After suffering a severe ankle injury during training, I thought my running days were over. The sports injury treatment I received was exceptional. The rehabilitation program was tailored specifically for runners, and I'm now back to competing at my previous level. Couldn't be happier with the results!",
    rating: 5,
    image: "üèÉ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è",
    condition: "Sports Injury Treatment"
  },
  {
    name: "Sarah Chen",
    role: "Teacher - Age 45",
    text: "I had been dealing with painful bunions for years, avoiding surgery due to fear and work commitments. The minimally invasive procedure was a game-changer. Recovery was much faster than expected, and I was back on my feet teaching within weeks. The pain is completely gone!",
    rating: 5,
    image: "üë©‚Äçüè´",
    condition: "Surgical Procedures"
  },
  {
    name: "Robert Wilson",
    role: "Retiree - Age 67",
    text: "Regular foot maintenance has become so much easier with their general podiatry services. From nail care to callus treatment, everything is handled professionally. The preventive approach has helped me avoid serious foot problems, and I feel confident about my foot health.",
    rating: 5,
    image: "üë®‚Äçü¶≥",
    condition: "General Podiatry"
  },
  {
    name: "Emily Davis",
    role: "Nurse - Age 29",
    text: "Working 12-hour shifts on my feet was becoming unbearable due to chronic foot pain. The comprehensive assessment identified the root cause, and the treatment plan has been life-changing. I can now work comfortably and enjoy my active lifestyle again.",
    rating: 5,
    image: "üë©‚Äç‚öïÔ∏è",
    condition: "General Podiatry"
  },
  {
    name: "Michael Brown",
    role: "Construction Worker - Age 41",
    text: "After a workplace injury damaged my foot, I needed specialized care. The surgical team was incredible, and the post-operative support was outstanding. I'm back to work with full mobility and no pain. Highly recommend their services to anyone facing similar challenges.",
    rating: 5,
    image: "üë∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è",
    condition: "Surgical Procedures"
  }
];
